Total Game Size Unpacked:  ~ 6.3 GB

How to Use:

Use either:

A- Manual Mount
1-Mount the ISO with either UltraISO/PowerISO or other alternatives...
2-Open the Mounted ISO and execute autorun.exe (100% scanned & safe)

Note: ISOs can be opened directly with Windows 8

OR

B- Burn to DVD
1- Burn The DVD using any burning software
2- Re-Insert DVD after burning for Autorun...

Note: If your PC doesn't support Autorun.. Go to Computer (Win7) , My Computer (XP), This PC (Win8.1)
then open your DVD's directory then execute autorun.exe

Additional Information such as patch or registration key are included in the setup (but most of them are pre-cracke
